content:
Find, Attach, and Email Articles with the Case Feed Articles Tool

Knowledge articles can help you solve cases more quickly by providing in-depth troubleshooting steps and other detailed information. Use the articles tool in Case Feed to search for articles relevant to the case you're working with.

Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Required user permissions: Manage Cases and Read on at least one article type

To use the articles tool:

* Click to open the tool.
* Search for articles by typing terms in the search box and clicking Search Again or Advanced Article Search.
* Select what you want to do with an article:
	+ Email to customer: Attach the article as a PDF to a message.
	+ Attach to case: Include the article as a case attachment.

Let us know if this article solved your issue.
title: Utilizing Case Feed Articles Tool in Service Cloud
